item.description: Metapopulation questions 1 What is the equilibrium fraction of occupied patches for the mainland-island model with a colonization rate of 0.5, and an extinction rate of 0.3? How does this change compared to the standard Levin’s model? What explains this change? 2 Incorporate a rescue effect into the above model and calculate the equilibrium fraction of occupied patches. What is this new value, and how does it compare to the mainland-island and Levin’s equilibrium values?
